mnemonic: QUE HORAS SÃO = what HOURS are (they)?
cultural_note: Portuguese often use 24-hour time: '15 horas' = 3 PM.
tip: Most common way to ask time
example2_en: Do you know what time it is?
distractors: a que horas;é uma hora;são duas horas

mnemonic: É UMA HORA - only ONE uses singular É!
grammar_notes: Singular 'é' only for 1 o'clock. All others use 'são'.
cultural_note: 'Uma hora' is also used for duration: 'dura uma hora' (lasts an hour).

mnemonic: SÃO DUAS HORAS - they ARE two HOURS!
cultural_note: Portuguese punctuality varies - 'duas horas' might mean 2:15!

mnemonic: MEIO-DIA = HALF-DAY - middle of the day!
cultural_note: Portuguese lunch is sacred - 'meio-dia' is when restaurants fill up!

mnemonic: MEIA-NOITE = HALF-NIGHT - middle of the night!
cultural_note: Portuguese New Year: at 'meia-noite' eat 12 raisins for luck!

mnemonic: E MEIA = AND HALF - half past the hour!
grammar_notes: Add after the hour: 'São três e meia' = 3:30.
cultural_note: 'E meia' is quicker than saying 'e trinta minutos'.
distractors: e um quarto;menos um quarto;em ponto

mnemonic: E UM QUARTO = AND A QUARTER - 15 minutes past!
cultural_note: For precision Portuguese often say exact minutes: 'e quinze'.

mnemonic: MENOS = MINUS a quarter - subtract 15 min!
cultural_note: Can also say 'quinze para as seis' (fifteen to six).

mnemonic: DA MANHÃ = of the MORNING - AM time!
grammar_notes: Use for morning hours. 'Manhã' is feminine.
cultural_note: Portuguese breakfast is light - just coffee and toast 'da manhã'.

mnemonic: DA TARDE = of the AFTERNOON - PM until evening!
grammar_notes: Use from noon to around 6-7 PM.
cultural_note: 'Boa tarde' greeting time - 12 PM to 6 PM roughly.

mnemonic: DA NOITE = of the NIGHT - evening hours!
grammar_notes: Use after dark. Roughly 7 PM onward.
cultural_note: Portuguese dinner is late - '9 da noite' is normal dinner time!

mnemonic: A QUE HORAS = AT what HOURS?
grammar_notes: Use 'a' for 'at'. 'A que horas abre?' = At what time does it open?
cultural_note: Essential for scheduling: shops restaurants appointments.
example1_en: At what time does it open?
example2_en: At what time does it arrive?
